wikipedia_page.main: Stella March was pen name of Marjorie Bell Marshall (15 November 1915 – 1 August 2010) was a British writer of romance novels from 1956 to 1986. She was the fourth elected Chairman (1967–1969) of the Romantic Novelists' Association.

response: * Stella March (1916–2010), British writer of romance novels
* Stella March, pen name of a British romance novelist
